name: Cookie Law Bar
author: WidgetPack

sections.description:
A simple and lightweight cookie law WordPress plugin for show information that your website uses cookie. Perfect for implementation of EU cookie law!

Online demo: http://demo.richplugins.com/

Feel free to try our other widgets powered by Widget Pack.

Features

  • It’s free
  • Adaptive design
  • Zero load time
  • Smooth slide bottom or top bar
  • Changeable: position, message, color, button text

Support

  • Chat support https://widgetpack.com/forum

  • Email support contact@widgetpack.com
sections.installation:
Unpack archive to this archive to the ‘wp-content/plugins/’ directory inside of WordPress.
Activate the plugin.
That’s all!

  • Maintain the directory structure of the archive (all extracted files should exist in ‘wp-content/plugins/cookie-law-bar/’)

sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Unpack archive to this archive to the ‘wp-content/plugins/’ directory inside of WordPress.
Activate the plugin.
That’s all!

  • Maintain the directory structure of the archive (all extracted files should exist in ‘wp-content/plugins/cookie-law-bar/’)

short_description: Cookie Law Bar show bottom or top bar to inform users that your website uses cookie according to EU law.
